name: Ari And The Puzzle 1.0.0
description:
Late Christmas gift for my girlfriend:
Merry Christmas Ari-chan! I love you so much <3333

Music will be added soon probably I'm not sure atm

Collect puzzle pieces to continue from room to room without getting caught by the security cameras! That's it lol-

Have fun! (for a couple of minutes then leaving it on your desktop or deleting it)
